
### Leaflet

<https://github.com/rstudio/leaflet>

Leaflet is a JavaScript library for interactive maps based on OpenStreetMap data.

```{r message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)

# http://geog.uoregon.edu/GeogR/data/Rdata/geog495.RData
load('geog495.RData')
pal <- colorQuantile("YlOrRd", NULL, n = 8)

leaflet(orcounty.shp) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircleMarkers(data = orstationc, color = ~pal(tann))
```
